response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product to you. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it would be an excellent fit for your needs and aspirations. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. We understand that such an investment is not trivial, and we are confident that the product's worth to you surpasses this amount. We invite you to consider this offer carefully and let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We are here to assist you throughout the process.", "product_price": 1200000}
